verses.verse: Come <S%H3381>down<s%>, and <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, O <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%>: there is no <S%H3678>throne<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>: for you shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H6028>delicate<s%>.

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H7347>millstones<s%>, and <S%H2912>grind<s%> <S%H7058>meal<s%>: <S%H1540>uncover<s%> your <S%H6777>locks<s%>, make <S%H2834>bare<s%> the <S%H7640>leg<s%>, <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H7785>thigh<s%>, pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%>.

Your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> shall be <S%H1540>uncovered<s%>, <S%H2781>Yes<s%>, your shame shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%>: I will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>, and I will not <S%H6293>meet<s%> you as a <S%H120>man<s%>.
As for our <S%H1350>redeemer<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H3427>Sit<s%> you <S%H1748>silent<s%>, and <S%H935>get<s%> you into <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>: for you shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%>, The <S%H1404>lady<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>.

I was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with my <S%H5971>people<s%>, I have <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and <S%H5414>given<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>: you did <S%H7760>show<s%> them no <S%H7356>mercy<s%>; upon the <S%H2205>ancient<s%> have you <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>heavily<s%> laid your <S%H5923>yoke<s%>.

And you <S%H559>said<s%>, I shall be a <S%H1404>lady<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: so that you did not <S%H7760>lay<s%> these things to your <S%H3820>heart<s%>, neither did <S%H2142>remember<s%> the latter end of <S%H319>it<s%>.

Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> now <S%H5719>this<s%>, you that are given to pleasures, that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>carelessly<s%>, that <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, I <S%H657>am<s%>, and none else beside <S%H3427>me<s%>; I shall not sit as a <S%H490>widow<s%>, neither shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> the loss of <S%H7908>sons<s%>:

But these <S%H8147>two<s%> things shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you in a <S%H7281>moment<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, the loss of <S%H7908>sons<s%>, and <S%H489>widowhood<s%>: they shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon you in their <S%H8537>perfection<s%> for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H3785>sorceries<s%>, and for the <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H6109>abundance<s%> of your <S%H2267>enchantments<s%>.

For you have <S%H982>trusted<s%> in your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>: you have <S%H559>said<s%>, None <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H2451>me<s%>. Your wisdom and your <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, it has <S%H7725>perverted<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>; and you have said in your <S%H3820>heart<s%>, I <S%H657>am<s%>, and none else beside me.

Therefore shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H3045>you<s%>; you shall not know from from where it <S%H7837>rises<s%>: and <S%H1943>mischief<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon <S%H3201>you<s%>; you shall not be able to put it <S%H3722>off<s%>: and <S%H7722>desolation<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon you <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>, which you shall not <S%H3045>know<s%>.

<S%H5975>Stand<s%> now with your <S%H2267>enchantments<s%>, and with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H3785>sorceries<s%>, <S%H834>where<s%> you have <S%H3021>labored<s%> from your <S%H5271>youth<s%>; if so be you shall be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3276>profit<s%>, if so be you may <S%H6206>prevail<s%>.

You are <S%H3811>wearied<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H6098>counsels<s%>. Let now the <S%H1895>astrologers<s%>, the <S%H2374>stargazers<s%>, the <S%H2320>monthly<s%> <S%H3045>prognosticators<s%>, stand <S%H5975>up<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> you from these things that shall come upon <S%H935>you<s%>.

<S%H7179>Behold<s%>, they shall be as stubble; the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> <S%H5337>them<s%>; they shall not deliver <S%H5315>themselves<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3852>flame<s%>: there shall not be a <S%H1513>coal<s%> to <S%H2552>warm<s%> <S%H217>at<s%>, nor fire to sit before <S%H3427>it<s%>.

Thus shall they be unto you with whom you have <S%H3021>labored<s%>, even your <S%H5503>merchants<s%>, from your <S%H5271>youth<s%>: they shall <S%H8582>wander<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H5676>quarter<s%>; none shall save <S%H3467>you<s%>.
